Title: Relates to the discharge of residents of a community residence
Summary: Relates to the discharge of residents of a community residence; provides that nothing shall be deemed construed as creating a relationship of landlord and tenant between an operator of a community residence and a resident; defines community residence.
LawCode: Amd §§41.33, 41.41 & 41.44, Ment Hyg L; add §713-b, RPAP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law and the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to discharge of residents of a community residence
